A coworking space

We are opening brand new hackercafe in Utrecht (Amsterdam and other cities soon). For hackers, nerds, designers and coders. Everyone is welcome! We provide an awesome space to meet, discuss, work, game, code and learn. Fast internet and coffee are necessity and included!

Educate your self in our seminars

Play games and have fun
